snippet: The song “I’m Old Fashioned” wasn’t about the cocktail, but it’s a standard worth revisiting (and a good excuse to marvel at Fred Astaire’s singing voice).
abstract: The song “I’m Old Fashioned” wasn’t about the cocktail, but it’s a standard worth revisiting (and a good excuse to marvel at Fred Astaire’s singing voice).

headline.main: The Old-Fashioned, in Song and Dance
